sec.p: Thirteen items from the QPS Nordic questionnaire [ 43] is used to measure therapistsâ€™ coping with work (6 items) and job demands (7 items). The scale is scored from 1 (very seldom or never) to 5 (very often or always). The reliability has shown to be satisfactory and is a good instrument for assessing health-related factors at work [ 44].
